title: Double Indemnity (restored, colorized, with intro and outro) (1944, film noir, imdb score: 8.3)

sources.title: Double Indemnity 1944 Colorized Movie 576p
sources.description: Double Indemnity is a 1944 American psychological thriller film noir directed by Billy Wilder, co-written by Wilder and Raymond Chandler, and produced by Buddy DeSylva and Joseph Sistrom. The screenplay was based on James M. Cain's 1943 novel of the same title, which appeared as an eight-part serial for the Liberty magazine in February 1936.
